name: Lillian Bush
text: They took our money but we’re still living out of boxes!  After more than a year of trying to get started with building a safe place for us to live we’re forced to move on. We are both over 70 and sick. Our home is more than one hundred years old so utilities and maintenance are very high. We went through winter using space heaters. When we turned the air conditioner on it caught fire after just two days of use!  Mobility issues mean we could not get out quickly in an emergency but they won’t even return calls or discuss the refunding of our money. They are dishonest and heartless so please don’t follow my lead. Do not trust these people to do what they say!

name: Deborah Deskins
text: They don't honor their contracts! Been dealing with this over a year now. They put a different roof on my home than the blueprints state and now my hvac system can't be put in the attic where I originally wanted it to go. Have had to redo practically everything from the roof down! Now having trouble getting inspections passed. I would not recommend this company.

name: Michael Robinson
text: If you want a new home just the way that you want and at a great price  stop playing around  and go now  and check other this new place and sit down  and let them fix you up getting  my daughter one first and then me one also theses  people are a blessing

name: gaius thompson
text: I'm taking bets to see how long they will be in business before the lawsuits and attorney general shuts them down. This place is just the absolute worst because they will take a $50,000 deposit and a year later you are still living in a camper. The houses don't meet code and this was just a good idea theoretically but in reality little Custom Homes sucks.

name: Justin Massimo
text: Unbelievably beautiful homes at a very affordable price, best part... Delivered to your door!

name: Beth Kenny
text: 6 months since we put Downpayment and not a stick or brick on our property

name: Jearl Robinson (The Great Ungabunga)
text: Beautiful homes at a great price.

name: Michelle Angle
text: Charging way to much for those homes

name: Ashley Peters
text: Love love love!! Ask for Jody Glass, she's amazing!!

name: alabama werewolf
text: Doesn't have a very good selection, although they did say they would be getting more. The problem is the salesman that we spoke to was kind of rude. He rushed us through and didn't have a lot of information.

resp.text: Hi and thanks for reaching out. Customer experience is of the upmost importance to us, however, we show no record of a visit from you. Please contact us at 205-755-4023. Thank you.

name: J Young
text: Eric and Tim were wonderful to work with.  They took care of all my needs and did a great job with the entire process from start to finish.  Thanks guys for great service and a great home!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words! We love having you as a part of our Clayton family! 😃

name: Angel Galloway
text: We purchased our home 4 years ago, the staff, salesman ect.. were super easy to work with no complaints about them however our buccaneer home has never been what it was supposed to be. From the looks it's beautiful but very cheaply built. Our kitchen drawers fell apart within 1 month of moving in. In fact one drawer stayed out for over a year waiting on them to order a new one. Our bathroom cabinet door broke off, all the trim (particle board) all throughout has peeled up. The carpet has never been tacked down properly and the carpet itself is the bare cheapest and you can look at and see that. We made a huge mistake in buying a buccaneer from Clayton homes and I cannot believe those nice men that work for Clayton would actually associate their own good names to sell homes so cheaply made. Definitely not worth the money

resp.text: Hi Angel- we sincerely appreciate you reaching out and sharing your feedback with us. We thrive on customer feedback in order to better our building processes, and we will forward this to our manufacturers. If you need to reach out for any reason, please call us at 205-755-4023.- Tim Slaney, G.M. Clayton Homes of Clanton

name: Felicia Fleming
text: The people here are excellent and easy to work with. This is a no pressure environment where the staff went above and beyond to help me. I was very satisfied with the service and the product. Jody is an excellent salesperson and I highly recommend her!

name: patrick penn
text: To whom this may concern. My parents were trying to purchase a home through a lady named Nichole. From my understanding this lady took my parents money. She told them lie after lie. Now the home they were supposed to getting they are not getting now. I don't know what the issues are but someone needs to contact me ASAP!!!!

resp.text: Hi Patrick, we appreciate you reaching out. We think you may have us confused with another home dealer in town. We apologize for any confusion, and we would be glad to help you with your housing needs. Please call me at 205-755-4023. Thanks! -Tim Slaney, G.M. Clayton Homes of Clanton

name: Justin “Krikit” Whitman
text: If you want a nice home this is where u go

resp.text: Thank you, Justin! We really appreciate that!

name: christopher Chris
text: Wood give them 1 star but anyway if your looking to buy a home from them your wasting your time me and my wife went ther the lady show us around took are informed and said she was going to call us but never did we call her she won't even pick up i guess ill be my business somewhere else

resp.text: Chris, I apologize that one of my Team Members didn't follow up with you. My name is Tim Slaney, and I am the General Manager here at Clayton Homes of Clanton. Please, call me at 205-755-4023, so I can personally assist you and your family with your housing needs.

name: Julie Rowe
text: Salesman was thouroughly and knowlegable and walked me through several models in the configuration I was interested in, did not pressure me

name: Chris Pence
text: Really nice staff.They are willing to work on a designed floor plan to fit our needs.

name: Laura Hollis
text: I called and spoke to a sales person by the name of Daniel.....he was very nice on the phone, but once we drove over an hour to actually talk to him in person about a home he was very rude. I called and spoke to Susan who states she is the sales manager. She agreed about the rudeness and said she would help me. I sent her all the information she needed to get a quote on a particular home. A week goes by and she never calls. I finally called her back today and she tells me that she did not have time to get back with me. She was very nonchalant about not getting back with me. Its just RUDE.....

name: Chassey Wooten
text: Check them out they have some really good ones to choose from

name: jessica miller
text: Very friendly staff, was easy to get financing.

name: Farrah Cooper
text: Beautiful homes

name: Ashley Johnson
text: They’ve been great coming and fixing problems we’ve had

name: Kirsten Schindler
text: Very helpful staff, beautiful homes!

name: Chasity Blalock
text: Nice people good selection

name: Kayleigh Murphy
text: Place to go

resp.text: Thank you, Kayleigh!

name: Gene Pace
text: Didn't follow up with warranty, home still missing parts from transport

name: Kim Bowen
text: Daniel is awesome.

name: Lawson Whitman
text: Kind ,perusal,

resp.text: Thank you, Lawson!

name: Jkline32
text: Good service

name: Jeff Fitzgerald
text: Bert was helpful, informative and kind. He was very patient and generous with his time

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words, it's always great making new friends.

name: Gabrielle George
text: My husband and I stopped by Mundy Homes today to look at a home we seen online and were very happy with the visit. The man we spoke with immediately took us to his office and explained the entire buying process with us in great detail! He answered every question I had about purchasing a mobile home and gave us a lot of information I wouldn't of thought to ask. No pressure to buy but rather a friendly and informative environment. We left excited and we look forward to working with them in the future.

resp.text: Gabrielle, thank you so much for taking the time to write this about your experience with us. When you get ready for a new home we will be here to help you every step of the way. Again Thank you.we really appreciate it.

name: Ted Carson
text:
Very Well Informed on any info you could want, very professional and friendly no pressure to buy !
when your ready they'll help with everything , even on finding lots for you..
They'll walk you through everything.
please stop by and tell Howdy for me..

name: Mayra Pangborn
text: David was great, he explained all the costs and times to consider. I will buy from here when the time is right!!

resp.text: Mayra thank you so much for the review and mentioning David. We really appreciate it and look forward to seeing you again in the future.

name: Daniel de Quesada
text: My wife and I were just browsing at local mobile home dealers, so we decided to check out Mundy. We were instantly greeted and asked what we were looking for in a home. We explained what we wanted and were introduced to David, a sales rep. He was very kind, courteous and answered any and all questions we had. We were shown several, beautiful homes and David was very patient with us, as we were looking around. It was cold outside, but David still allowed us to see any home we wanted to see. We finished our tour of the homes, and he sat with us and broke down prices of the models we were interested in. We were extremely pleased with the experience there and with the professionalism of David and the staff at Mundy. I would highly recommend them if you are looking to buy a new or used mobile home.

resp.text:
Daniel
Thank you for the positive review. We really appreciate it. David has been a part of the Mundy Home Center team since 1989. He really takes care of his customers before and after the sale. He is definitely family. We sure hope you become apart of our family of homeowners also.  Thanks again!

name: I wood
text: Nice people and nice trailers

name: Melissa Fleming
text: Thank you so much for help! Great people,  great fast work! My home was delivered today & set up within days of purchase! They make you feel like family! Help you in anyway they can!!!

resp.text: Melissa- Thank you for the review- we really appreciate the business and have enjoyed working with y'all.

name: Brittany Skinner
text: We are in the process of buying a home from Mundy and they have been phenomenal! David and Judy have worked with us and really gone above and beyond to make our home-buying experience a good one. If there was anything I didn't understand, they were quick to explain without making me feel dumb for not knowing. They worked within our price range and didn't pressure us to buy anything out of it. The homes are high quality and reasonably priced. Overall I highly recommend Mundy Homes Center.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving a review Brittany. We look forward to working with you and really appreciate the business!

name: Curtis Clemons
text: Real nice homes I'm trying to a home

name: James “Trey” Wilson
text: Some really nice Mobile homes in stock right now and great customer service

name: Dennis Mc
text: Personable staff made looking at mobile homes pleasant

name: Troy Brooks
text: Everyone at Mundy's has really helped me out in getting my first home. Don helped me get my lot ready and Teresa with financing. I would recommend Mundy Homes to all my friends and family without hesitation.

name: Kevin Hardy
text: Great people to deal with- love my home and they took care of the few issues I had. Would recommend Mundy Homes.

name: Tricia P
text: Great selection of quality affordable homes.

name: Angie Richardson
text: Don't use Jane the realtor there at Mundy Homes, she is only after a sale and will not help you withloose ends after closing she is very unprofessional.

name: Sandy Swauger - Upton
text: Great selections and wonderful sales team!

name: Weston Whitt
text: Don't buy a home here !!! This is the worst company ever !!! Our home is only one year old and has been falling apart since the day we bought it! Munday homes tells us their coming out and fixing this or that and THEY NEVER SHOW !!!

name: Monster Babe
text: Nice staff. Not that eager to sell or answer questions.

name: Furlough Wrecker Service
text: DAVID IS AWESOME

name: Manuel Lueras
text: My wife and I have had an excellent experience from the start. Tara has been absolutely wonderful and helpful from the start. Answering all of our questions and following up with us.  I would highly recommend this company to anyone looking.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words, Manuel!

name: Donald Barnes
text: Looking at there homes was great.

name: Alana Fenn
text: Tara is absolutely amazing! I couldn't ask for someone better to be helping us! I trust her with everything. She is great at her job and looks out for you every step of the way. She deserves a raise!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words, Alana!

name: Shari Barfield Newman
text: We came into this establishment today at around 4:15.  The lady that was in the office would not take us to see any of the homes until my wife filled out some information.   So this employee was either too lazy to show us or she was profiling us.  We came up in our 2007 Toyota and she probably thought we were not able to buy anything.   Well, my wife you meet is a retired Major of the US Army and has her Ph.D.  She has worked 30 plus years  and has never been unemployed.   I have been in the medical field for 38 years and make a good living.  If this is your policy,  it needs to change.  If this is her work ethic, she needs fired.  You missed a sale.....you are a Karen, karen

resp.text: Hi Shari, thank you so much for reaching out. We're sorry to hear of these concerns, and we'd like to learn more. Please contact our management team at 256-233-3101.

name: Sam Gentle
text: Tara has been exceptional, she has been very kind helping my mom find a home. Even after we got keys Tara still checks on her! Thank you

resp.text: Hi Sam! Thanks so much! We'll share this feedback with Tara!

name: Tara A. Skipper
text: Tara was so helpful to us. Though we are difficult and change our minds often, she’s been very patient and hasn’t pressured us one way or another.

resp.text: We're happy to have a great team member like Tara! Thank you for the kind words!

name: Ben Cooper
text: We are buying in TN, 6 hours from Athens. We didn’t realize we couldn’t buy here and move it there. Tara was very nice and still showed us a home, the big green house. It’s beautiful!

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome feedback, Ben! We're happy you found out we could move the home! We're happy to be your chosen home buyer retailer 😊

name: Debbie Kesmodel
text: Kristie & Tara were very nice yesterday, my mom was looking for a home and Tara was very nice trying to help my mom who wasn’t being easy. While waiting for the first girl Kristi got us cokes. Drinks were free, I Love the big one up front we got to see, it’s so nice.

resp.text: Thank you for visiting with us, Debbie! We're so glad that you and your mom stopped by! And cokes are always on us 😉

name: Randy Kuby
text: We have been working with Tara Birkla at Clayton homes in Athens . We are almost to the point of closing. She has been there for us when we had questions and concerns bout the whole process. Even after hours if something came up I could hit her up on the cell. If she didn't know answer she would find out and would get back to us asap. I especially like the fact that we have several times changed our minds on few things and Tara wouldn't get mad. Constantly told us this will be our home make it how we like it. Keep up the great work Tara and our family thanks u!

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us, Randy. We are so glad you chose Clayton Homes!

name: Tonya Taylor
text: We purchased a home from Clayton homes and Tara was our sales rep. She is absolutely amazing! We went a few times to look at diff homes and trying to make sure we were making the right decision. She was very patient with us and answered any questions we had no matter what time of day it was. She took the time to ask us what we really wanted and what our budget was. We went back after doing our on research and thinking we knew exactly what we wanted until she said she had something she knew we would love and she was correct. Tara listen to us and really knew what we were looking for and showed us the perfect home. We fell in love as soon as we walked in. I also love the fact that she was never pushy and trying to talk us into buying something just to be buying. Overall it took us about two years to make a decision and she patiently waited and worked with us the whole time. Now we are just waiting for our new home to be built! We can’t wait! Thank you Tara for everything!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words, Tonya!

name: Ronnie Austin Jr
text: I have been looking for homes for many months in the housing market. Very tough market these days. But I decided to go a different route with homes. I had seen Clayton homes athes, and decided to give them a shot. And im glad I did. I had meet Tara witch was very knowledgeable, Easy to talk to, and attentive to question. I would recommend clayton homes, and send allbI kjowbto Tara, thank you Tara.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Ronnie!

name: Ben Hubbard
text: Not a lot of homes but Tera was great. They were busy we didn’t have appointment but she helped us anyway. Another lady got us water as we waited in lobby for a sales person. Super nice. Tera knew her stuff, will be going to a Clayton in GA when we buy. Didn’t think about this Clayton not being able to sale us, I guess 320 miles is a long drive. My girlfriend loved her too and we both love the lulabell.

resp.text: Hi Ben! We're so glad you all stopped by! We hope to see you again soon! Please let us know if you have any questions!

name: Hannah Finnigan
text: Al and Tara were very nice. We came in Saturday and Al got me a water. Then once Tara finished up she came and helped us. Very nice people here and very pretty homes. My sister is in the market she was very happy with the homes!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words, Hannah! We really appreciate you all visiting us, and we look forward to speaking with you again!

name: Patricia Kerins
text: Wow....not good. We came here to see homes here about a year ago. TARA was not very helpful or enthusiastic about her job, also they inventory was nearly 0 . We Came out here today and was hoping for a better experience.  I was actually worse! Upon entering Tara came at us saying we HAD to wear masks. We informed her that due to medical reasons we are exempt according to Alabama and CDC guidelines. My husband also pointed out that the secretary wasn't even wearing one! SMH!! Tara didn't care one bit and we left! We called the Decatur location and was welcomed with open arms

resp.text: We are very sorry to hear you had a negative experience at one of our Clayton retail locations.  Every state has different guidance when it comes to interacting with our customers during the pandemic, and we appreciate your understanding as we navigate these uncertain times.  If you would like to talk to one of our Customer Advocacy representatives about this situation further, please call 877-264-2812. Thank you very much for letting us know about your recent experience.

name: Marla Wachter
text: My husband and I bought a home from here about 7 years ago. Now it is falling apart due to poor workmanship. The first year when  it was still under warranty we called multiple times to get some one out to fix blatantly obvious problems and they never got back to us and when they finally did send someone out they “bandaid fixed” things then waited till the one year was up to say they could not do anything about it. Now we are stuck with a $40,000 junk money pit of a house.

resp.text: Hi Marla, thank you for reaching out. Customer experience is of the upmost importance to us, and we take this feedback very seriously. Clayton Homes of Athens strives to provide a world-class customer experience, and all our homes come with a one-year manufacturer's warranty to correct any issues. If you have questions, please contact us at 256-233-3101.

name: Arielle Robinson
text:
We went to Clayton homes to look at  a home we saw online. We were greeted by a wonderful sales lady named Tara, she was fantastic in helping us getting the perfect home to suit or needs. She was very patient and thorough as well. Thank you for being awesome Tara. We can’t wait to have our home in august!
The Robinson’s

resp.text: Thank you so much, Alice! We are so glad that you all visited with us here at Clayton Homes of Athens! We are very excited for you! 😁

name: Gigi Killen
text: We were meet by Tera who got us a drink and sat us down. She was very nice. Taylor helped my parents, she was very kind. Homes were great

resp.text: Thank you so much, Gigi!

name: Lori Sutherland
text: Tara at Clayton Homes in Athens is awesome. She has such a happy and positive attitude. I could not ask for a better person to help us with our options and plans for our future. Awesome!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Lori! We really appreciate the kind words! Tara is a wonderful asset to our team!

name: Frank Pendergast
text: The Clayton experience has been excellent so far! Tara is a professional and great to work with!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Frank!

name: Ben F
text: I went with my daughter Wednesday but Tera was nice and tried to show us some online and a few in person. Wasn’t a lot to look at

resp.text: Hi Ben! We're so happy you all stopped by! We are always changing and we really hope to help you guys find a home!

name: carliauna cole
text: Awesome service!!!! Can’t speak enough goodness about this group!!! Tara Berkla is a top notch sales person!! I’ll always use them for all my home purchases! Their prices are great and they have tons of homes to choose from!! If you are in the market for a new home this is the place to go!!! Ask for Tara and she will take care of the rest!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Carliauna! We appreciate the kind words!

name: Patti Carter
text: We were looking for a new home, we decided to stop at Clayton Homes in Athens Alabama. We walked in and were greeted immediately by Tara. She took the info we gave her and showed us all of the homes that had all of our requirements. Tara was very knowledgeable and informative. We couldn’t have been more satisfied. We are currently under contract and awaiting our new Clayton Home. We couldn’t be happier with the service provided by Tara!!!

resp.text: Patti, thank you for the kind words! We really appreciate your support!

name: Kimberly Gates
text: Just wanted to thank everyone at Clayton of Athens.  Tara did a great job and always made us feel important.  We look forward to many great years in my moms new home ❤️

resp.text: Thank you, Kimberly, for being such an awesome customer! We are so happy for you all, and thank you again for choosing Clayton Homes of Athens!

name: April Wells
text: My husband and I had looked at MH in Huntsville and since we passed Clayton Homes in Athens one day, we decided to stop in. I was scared at first due to hearing their prices were high. The saleslady, Tara, greeted us and asked all the right questions before showing us what they had to match our criteria. I thought this process was great so she wouldn't waste our time nor did we waste hers. We found the one we wanted. We left and got maybe a mile down the road and didn't know what our next step would be. With Tara not bring a pushy sales person she told her to think about it and get back with her when we decided what to do next. So she was surprised when we walked back in. We went through the pre approval, she assisted with any questions we had. We got a quick response and went back to do final paperwork. I wanted to make sure this is the one we wanted and asked to look at a few more. Tara didn't hesitate to show us others. We then found the PERFECT one. We hope to be closed within a month or sooner. Tara is really great to work with. She keeps us informed every step of the way. I would recommend her to my family and friends. Plus, she's down to earth and has a beautiful smile.

resp.text: April, we can't thank you enough for taking the time to share your experience! We're glad you became a part of our Clayton family!

name: T Davis
text: Tara helped us in our home search, we weren’t able to buy but once we are we will be back to see her. If your looking for a home pick Clayton and Tara!

resp.text: Hey T Davis, we really hope to hear from you soon! We're always here should you want to visit with us again soon!

name: Joseph Bunton
text: I just want there to look at some new homes. Seam like there just wanted to give me the run around about looking a the homes there.so I wen to the Decatur one didn't have no issue like it did at the Athens al one. It should not be that difficult to want to look at the house there.

name: curtis carter
text: Tara helped us find our perfect home. I would recommend Tara and Clayton Homes in Athens Alabama.

resp.text: Thank you, Curtis! We really enjoyed working with you!

name: Faye Richards-Williams
text: Lousy customer service

resp.text: Hi Faye, thank you for reaching out and sharing these concerns with us. Can you please reach out to our management at 256-233-3101 so we may address any issues? We look forward to speaking with you.

name: Shaunteka Bell
text: Mary Jane was great! She was very kind, professional and patient. From day one she made communication very easy and was available with all the answers to my questions. She goes above and beyond in the customer service department!

name: Daniel Webster
text: My wife and I stopped here today to try and look at a few different models. With the kids gone we were unsure about how many bedrooms to get or what kind of house to do. We’ve been exploring modular, conventional as well as manufactured housing. We also needed to explore options for an in-law house on the same property so we were actually shopping for two houses. Today’s experience pretty well sealed the deal with staying away from a manufactured house. It was not a welcoming we expected and instead felt like a used car buying experience. The guy wanted to get info from us that we were not certain of yet and wasn’t happy with our time frame of inside of two years. When we told him we just wanted to look he replied back with, “ we only have two sales people and looking at all of them could take all day” being a business owner my self, if it takes me all day to make the customer happy, then so be it. We drove away, both telling each other that our business will stay far away from this place even if it means spending more money to do so.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear that your experience was not a positive one with Clayton of Athens. Our Sales Professionals want to understand as much about your home buying needs so we can provide you the best buying experience. If there is anything we can ever do in the future to meet your housing needs, please don’t hesitate to reach out us at 256-233-3101.

name: Katherine Balcacer
text: Top of the line mobile homes. Great design. Awesome staff. Will work with you.

name: Marcus
text: Alex was definitelyntly very helpful and proffessional at showing us some beautiful homes that they have there and also with helpful information on buying from Clayton homes in the near future I will definitely be visiting him again when I am ready to make my big purchase!!!

resp.text: We appreciate that, Marcus! We can't wait to see you again at Clayton Homes of Athens!

name: Maurice Ruffin
text: We have had such a wonderful experience dealing with Tara. She is very helpful in anyway she can help. Although sometimes they can be very busy they tend to get back with you as soon as possible. Very understanding and receiving as to what the customer needs and wants in their home..

name: Wendy Hall
text: Walked in as they were closing but Tara was nice and let us look at the new home upfront. Is was so nice and the staff is friendly. Thank you

name: Sharon Wexler
text:
We were really desperately searching for options for a home as the one we had just purchased on 23 acres was unlivable. Taylor saw our distress and immediately gave us reassuring confidence that she would do anything to calm our fears and make the process worry free.  We are retired and wanted to have a comfortable, easy care home that was all inclusive. Taylor took care of everything. She showed us beautiful homes from which to choose. The buying process was made a superb experience. Every single detail was taken care of professionally and we felt genuinely as ease confident that we would be in a new home designed with every custom detail to our satisfaction.
We are now two nights in our beautiful new home.
Taylor was wonderful. She took personal interest in us and we feel we made a friend not just a business relationship with Taylor.

name: Nicholas Ward
text: This is a very professional establishment, all my needs were met with my interest in buying a home from them. Mary Jane Johnson was very informative and knowledgeable of the process and also the homes themselves. Couldn't have asked for a better experience when dealing with a manufactured home dealer. Thank you for your personal interest in my situation and what fit me best in my search for a home. I genuinely enjoyed the service and respect I was handled with.

name: Terry Butler (Butler Team Roping)
text: Very bad customer service. Apparently you're not allowed to look at the homes without a salesperson opening every home for you one at a time. I've never seen that before. My husband and I waited in the office and walked around looking for someone. Of the several people that were in the office, no one acknowledged us. They just kept their eyes on their computer screens. We finally found another person on a tour and inquired about looking at houses. She gave us a quick reply that they were all locked and we couldn't look with out someone. There was no effort made to point us toward someone. I understand the houses being locked; however, if policy requires that someone open each house for perspective buyers, there should be sales people visible and available to speak with them. I've been to several Clayton Homes sales lots and have been given keys to open the homes and look at them at my own pace. They gave me a card and made sure I understood that they were there to answer any questions we had.  I personally do not like to have someone with me every step. I prefer to take my time and look at each home and weigh out the pros and cons and then speak with someone and ask questions. I can imagine this place had lost a considerable amount of business with this practice in place.

resp.text:
Hi Terry,

Thank you for your feedback. At Clayton Homes of Athens, we try to make sure all of our customers are helped right away and are given tours of all of the homes so we are available to answer any questions.  Our sales consultants also point out quite a few helpful features of our homes that you might not be aware of, such as our energy efficient windows and water heaters.  We also always keep our homes locked so they are protected for their future owner—we want to make sure everyone has a beautiful home. I’m sorry that you did not have a good experience this time. I would be happy to talk to you more about it, so please give me a call at 256-233-3101 at your convenience. Thank you! Roddy, General Manager

name: Hannah Kimbrough
text: Very nice lady, talked to fast but was very nice. Loved the big house!

name: Layne Steelman
text: Looked at a Beautiful Home. Mary Jane extremely nice. She gave us a great tour of one of their homes.

name: Nicole McNeal
text: Clayton Homes has to be the most painless homebuying experience I’ve ever had!  They are all so friendly and easy to work with!!  I hope I’m getting my forever home but if I’m not I will be a repeat customer!!

name: Deborah Hopkins
text: Came in today to look at a double wide we'd seen online from another dealer when we seen they had the same one on this lot. Tara greated us. I explained that we would like to see a specific home and she said "go ahead and have a seat over there and i will be with you in a little while." I said no actially we just want to see the home. She replied "No we cant do that. We've got to sit down and talk to you and find out what youre looking for and what you want." I again explained that i just wanted to see the home. She flat out said she couldn't do that and dismissed herself. Ive never seen someone so rude and quick to dismiss doing business in my life. Her behavior is absolutely appalling! I will definitely not be doing any busy with your location because of her lack of professional behavior. She needs fired! How many more customers has she driven away?

resp.text:
Hi Deborah-
We apologize that our location did not satisfy your expectations. We set a high standard for ourselves as far as customer service and are truly sorry to hear that standard was not met in your interaction with our location. I would love to discuss your experience at your earliest convenience. Please reach out to me personally at  256-233-3101. Thank you! -Roddy Wade, G.M. Clayton Homes of Athens

name: Lady T
text: The salesman I had was very knowledgeable. He showed me everything and also owned a manufactured home himself. I prefer doing business with those that have or use the same product as they sale.

name: Kelli James
text: Awful service stopped to looked at some single wide trailers explain to the sales person I would like to see a couple between 30k and 60k some with Sheetrock and others that were not. (Taylor) wanted to get information some from me I explain that we were under time restraints and was needing to get to the hospital due to a family member sick. She proceeded to show me one trailer and we started walking back to the office I asked if that was all she was gonna show me and she said yes. Of course at that time I left and thanked her for her time. If you want to make a sale you need to get more sales training. I had time to look at 5 or 6 six trailers and it seemed because I would not take the time to fill out there information and sit down and chat about exactly what I was looking for she had not time for me!

resp.text: Hi Kelli, Thank you for your review. I am sorry to hear that you did not have a good experience. We try get to know all of our customers before we tour homes with them to make sure we are showing them the best homes that fits everything they are looking for (home size, price, different features, etc). We know that purchasing a home is a huge decision and not something to be rushed--we want to be sure you find your dream home! I would be happy to talk to you more about it, so please give me a call at 256-233-3101 at your convenience. We want to make sure our customers are happy and informed. Thank you - Roddy, GM

name: Savannah Ziegler
text: Hi my name is Savannah Ziegler me and my husband are going through them and I love them

name: Tina Crim
text: Beautiful homes and very good customer service!

name: Tracey Dildine
text:
After walking through the of the sales office Terra said with notepad in hand. Good morning, have you been here before? We said no,and was going to say " we just want to look around"  and she immediately charged us through to an office, told us to fill out a form so we could see houses. We stated we had seen the houses on line and there was one in particular we wanted see, we were so excited to know there was one locally as we were possibly moving to VA in the near future Then she said, "well if your not going to buy from Us then Im not showing you any homes, as we have to be here for our customers that are going to buy for us, we have had 7 customers this morning and dont have time for you if your not buying. My jaw hit the floor. My husband ripped up the form and said lets go. I thought for a minute she was joking, but the look on her face was that of disgust for us asking to view the home. He walked out, I asked her seriously you not going to show us 2 homes? She said no and walked out. All this happened within the first minute of the conversation.
Disgusted and appalled at her lack of customer service skills and thoughtlessness  for people wanting ideas for their home, I can honestly say she should be fired. I have never been spoken to like that before. My husband, being in the AF for 21 years was looking for a place we could settle down in, but it won't be from your company. We then wandered around the lot, going over in our heads "did we do something wrong" and found Jennifer moving furnture we asked if we could poke our heads in the door and she was very kind enough to let us. We then saw another sales person, Mary Jane and she was unlocking the house we were so excited to see. I asked her if she minded us looking inside and she was most pleasant and said of course, not "are you buying from us, not, sign this first", just great customer service. Thank you for teaching that sales person some respect of others.
We then went over to the green house as Terra had just gone in, and I tried the door handle, and it was locked! She came to the door and held it so close to her that I couldnt see inside if I wanted too. She said if you go back to the office and sign the form I will let you see the houses, I asked "did you seriously lock the door so I couldnt poke my head in the door" she replied "yes". Again, floored by her attitude and I laughed out loud because it was just so childish. I hope her customers knew they were locked in with her!  She then said I have nothing more to say, and shut the door in my face!
Apparently at some point In the office I used the word "darn or dam" as I was so disgusted by our treatment, and she said you can go now, I won't have someone cussing at me. I'm from England and this isn't particularly a cuss word.
To summarise for those of you thinking of buying from Clayton Homes in Athens dont bother. You may get lucky enough to speak with Mary Jane or you may get Terra. Good luck. Yes, I have a call in to the boss Roddy and yes I will be notifying the better business bureau. We are no headed to Mundy homes to find our forever home...
Tracey.

name: N Arreola
text: Can’t wait for my home very happy

name: Christa C.
text: Our girl was great. Go see tara

name: F D
text: We've lived in Alabama for 8 years. We are moving to Virginia the near term. We are working with a Clayton homes dealer in Va. We asked to be shown around the homes and Tara told us since we are not buying here they would NOT allow us to be shown around the homes.

name: Mike Campbell
text: Great place to buy a home!  Have had many friends and customers buy from Clayton Homes!

name: Lisa Settles
text: Very nice homes Clayton ' s has come a long way.

name: Amanda Adams
text:
Amanda A.
Had a very bad experience, boyfriend and I spotted one we really liked and decided to stop and look. However, we had to go in main office amd met with a woman and she called us in office, she asked us bunch of questions and kept on making excuses refusing to show us any homes and called us immature. We rather live in a card board box rather than go back there and deal with them. She was very unprofessional by saying we was very pre immature not knowing what we was doing.

resp.text:
Hi Amanda,
Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. I know that we have spoken since this, and I do apologize again that you had a less than satisfactory experience at our home center. We set a high standard for ourselves as far as customer service, and are truly sorry that was not your experience on your initial visit. I hope that we can help you in the future. Please let us know if you have any questions - we are happy to help! Thank you  - Roddy, GM.

name: Terry Light
text: I recently visited clayton homes in athens al.  The sales center seemed very professional. Maryjane Johnson was my sales rep. She was really interested in making sure all of my needs were taken care of when looking to buy a home. They had a lot of options and a great atmosphere as well. I am very happy I chose this center to look at buying a home, and would recommend them to anyone.

name: Linda W.
text: The sales reps were very nice , just not alot of inventory.

name: Farrah Cooper
text: Amazing homes and decor

name: timothy stevenson
text: Dishonest when it comes to contacts, still taking over a month to set up, will not obtain any permits. They claim they will take care of anything, I had to take care of everything, electrical hook up, septic, ect! If I could I would rate them an zero!

resp.text: Timothy, Thank you for your feedback. I definitely want to talk to you more about it, so please give me a call at 256-233-3101 so we can review the problem. We can't find a record of you purchasing from us, but I apologize that you had a bad experience, and I hope to talk to you soon. Thanks --- Taylor

name: Michael Dailey
text: Great Homes Selection and Customer Service.

name: Shelly McMillan
text: Taylor was very rude and refused to show us homes we asked about. She decided which ones to show us only two models off the whole lot . Worse lot within 50  miles.

resp.text: Hi Shelly, Thank you for your review. I am sorry to hear that you did not have a good experience. We try get to know all of our customers before we tour homes with them to make sure we are showing them the best homes that fits everything they are looking for (home size, price, different features, etc). I would be happy to talk to you more about it, so please give me a call at 256-233-3101 at your convenience. We want to make sure our customers are happy and informed. Thank you - Roddy, GM

name: KEITH GOINS
text: Decent home

name: Nuke Life
text: Extremely high prices for trailers, even the used ones. They have a lot of fees that add up.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback.  Unfortunately, we do not show a record of your information at our location, Clayton Homes of Athens. Please give me a call at 256-233-3101 so we can further discuss. I hope to talk to you soon! – Roddy Wade, General Manager, Clayton Homes of Athens, AL

name: tim shorey
text: The team at Decatur’s Clayton Homes, Bruce, Doug and Tim are awesome.  Eager to help at any length, very knowledgeable in the manufactured homes industry.  They take pride in their products the sell, do everything possible to give a good client the best experience in buying a home.  As a first time home/land buyer, Bruce went out of his way to make it as easy as possible for me.  Gave great advise on what steps needed done, and when to do them.  I recommend this team to anyone who is out to get a great home.  Job well done and thanks to each of you.

resp.text: Tim, we really appreciate your kind words, and we're so happy for you!

name: CHARTEASE CRITTENDON -CHAR STAR
text: Really nice selection of homes. Go check them out!!

name: Tiffany Hill
text: Worst Place!  Go somewhere else. Will quote a price and the next thing you know they increase price $10,000. Will refuse to work with you when called out on what they do. The guy over, Doug, is rude. Go to Clayton of Cullman!

resp.text: Hi Tiffany, thanks for reaching out and sharing your feedback with us. Home models start with base pricing, and a number of factors, including customization options, setup and delivery, can and will increase pricing. We're sorry to hear you weren't satisfied with our location but we wish you all the best on your home buying journey.

name: reedera4
text: A few of the homes we wanted to look at weren't set up and several homes on the website weren't available, either.  Salesperson said she would contact us with a price on a particular home we were interested in, but we never heard from her.  Also, when we were presented with a price for another home, there was no explanation or breakdown for the price quoted.  I asked about it and never got a clear answer.  Very frustrating!!  So, we're not going with a Clayton home.

resp.text: Hi Reedera4, we're sorry to hear about your visit experience. Please contact us at 256-350-6058 so we may learn more. Thank you!- Doug Lesley, G.M.

name: Heidi Kemery
text: Awesome team to work with!

name: Dale Brewer
text: Great service Great buying experience

resp.text: Thank you so much for being a great customer, Dale!

name: Cecil Melson
text:
We signed on the home in January 2020. Finally moved in late May 2020. I understand weather but I was prepping the land daily, if I could work I'm sure they could. Then after sales and set up the Decatur manager told me that any dirt work  needed would be taken care of after a month of setting. It now has been 2 months and he only told a guy to fill in the septic. Field lines almost turns over my zero turn mower. I would not recommend anyone looking for a new home to deal with the Decatur group.

Update: After talking with Doug a couple more times he and everyone at Clayton was more than happy to help me with any issues and I would be happy go back there in the future

resp.text: Hi Cecil, we appreciate your feedback, and we will be reaching out to you shortly to communicate with you on this. We apologize for the misunderstanding, as the field lines will be covered again when the rain stops.

name: Jason Stricklin
text: My home is the island breeze. And my exterior walls are not plumb so there for my door has daylight showing around the door,it has been replaced 3 times and the back door twice. I have staples sticking through the shingles windows are not square issues with my showers in both bathrooms. And Clayton homes says they aren't going to do anything about it,it's out of there control. They want never call me back and avoid me. So please dont let them take advantage of you to. If I could post pictures I would

resp.text: Hi Jason, we appreciate your feedback. We are sorry for the issues you're experiencing, however, we have attempted to the best of our abilities to accommodate you, however, we have been unable to come to an agreement regarding scheduling. We have asked that you contact us by phone regarding any further issues.

name: Loretta Riddle
text: Definitely would recommend people to come check out this place

resp.text: Thank you so much, Loretta! You are a star! 🤩

name: Carl
text: Worst customer experience. Drove 2 hours with a screaming baby because we had an appointment with the manager cause we were ready to buy right then and he didn’t show up! Nobody would help us.

name: Joseph Bunton
text: Very nice people there. I'll be back when I ready to put a new house.  Thankz for the help guy's. The one on hwy 31 in Decatur al

name: joshua gauntt
text: Good luck with this place. Me and my wife came in to the lot ready to buy a new home. At first the service was great but after a month has gone by nothing has got started they do not return calls they seem like they don't want your business. If you really want to waste time while trying to get a home you found the rite place. The only positive is the staff are very friendly

resp.text:
Hi Joshua-
We apologize that our location did not satisfy your expectations. We set a high standard for ourselves as far as customer service and are truly sorry to hear that standard was not met in your interaction with our location. I would love to discuss your experience at your earliest convenience. Please reach out to me personally at (256) 350-6058. Thank you! -Doug Lesley, G.M. Clayton Homes of Decatur

name: Austin Mann
text: Great sales team, great selection,  the market leader. They stand behind what they sell.

name: Megan Thornton
text: We went to Clayton Homes because of the good reputation and advertisement. The lady that helped us, Jeanie I think, was very nice and helpful. She wasn't a pushy salesperson; she let us look around and talk to each other and think about it with out trying to force anything on us. That being said, it went downhill after that. Once we paid and signed and were gone, customer service was not as good. They told us it would be 2-3 weeks before we got our home. Friday of the second week we still had not heard from them so called and left a message that was never returned. Tuesday we called again and they tell us that it is on the way while we're both at work. So he had to leave work since no one gave us a heads up. There are still drawers for the kitchen and light fixtures sitting in the living room floor, there are some minor flaws in the structure, the crew littered all over our yard (water bottles, bolts, screws, pieces of metal), we have no steps and it'll be a week tomorrow that it was delivered. We're having to climb in and out using a 5 gallon bucket. After the delivery we were told people would be back and we should get a phone call, that hasn't happened yet. We paid upfront and they acted like since they got their money we meant nothing any more. I would not recommend this place.

resp.text: Ms. Thornton, We are extremely sorry you have had this experience. We spoke with Mr. Sprague yesterday and are sending our service manager to the home on Friday. We typically wait until power and water are connected to the home to complete service. It's easier to see everything that needs to be corrected. We are happy to accommodate you guys if you feel it needs to happen before then. Again, sorry for any inconvenience. Please feel free to call me if you would like to speak further. Thank you--Mark, GM

name: Lallie Lucas
text: Beautiful home that's were I bought my last home friendly people

name: Sissy P.Edwards
text: Friendly people but they are there to sell. Nice homes

name: Teresa Cartee
text: Took a while to get everything done but the people where great and made some friends

name: chris masters
text: Doug Lesley  ,great guy want stop until your satisfied.

name: thomas dunnavant
text: Clayton Mobile homes sold a double wide with an attached two car garage to friends of mine and the structure was poorly built and it is falling down.  They refuse to make restitution, they hide behind the Manufacture Home Commission of Alabama and have interfered with there ability to have the home repaired.  In my opinion, Clayton Homes is the last place on earth to buy a trailer house, that's what they are... initiation nice, high priced cow haulers.

name: Elixir Plays
text: Great homes great atmosphere friendly staff

name: Matthew Merced
text: I bought a brand new house and had the worst experience of my life with them. The home was falling apart quality was awful repairs were slow and when they got the color wrong on it they acted like it wasn't their fault or problem. Do not buy from here

resp.text:
Matthew,

Thank you for your review. I'm sorry to hear that you didn't have a good experience. I know we have spoken about this several times, and tried to resolve all of the issues listed. I believe that we have taken care of everything at this point, but please give me a call at the store if you need any further help. Thanks, Mark-GM

Cassie,

We would love the opportunity to learn more, so please call me at 256-350-6058 so we can discuss further. Thank you and hope to hear from you soon! – Doug Lesley, G.M. Clayton Homes of Decatur

name: Jojo
text: Was just looking, and planning ahead!

name: Paula Godwin
text: Just love it

name: Ethan Nail
text: Not helpful

name: Krystal George
text: Dave has been amazing. Moving is stressful, moving to a new area is even more stressful. Dave has helped so much. If I could give him more than 5 Stars I would. Things happen, time frames change, bumps in the road happen, but Dave has helped us with this transition. He has kept us up to date on everything to his best ability. He goes above and beyond to make sure the customer is happy and informed. I highly recommend this sales rep. If you are looking for a new home Dave is definitely who you want on your side.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Krystal! We're so happy that Dave was able to make your experience stress free and wonderful!

name: Deanna Hall
text:
After visiting other local dealerships we decided to drop in at Truvalue Homes just in case they might have something we like in stock. Dave Chesterman has been awesome from the moment we walked inside the office. He helped us more in two hours of time than the other places have helped us in over three months of working with us. Dave was helpful and knowledgeable and very patient with us and all of my questions. If he didn’t know the answer he found the answer. He’s been super flexible dedicating  his own personal time to answer my questions outside of his workday hours.  Because of Dave I give Truvalue Homes⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Barbara D. Abercrombie (Deanna Hall)

resp.text: Thank you so much for all the stars, Deanna! 😍😍😍 We're so glad you've had such a great experience.

name: Jessica Foster
text: We first went to TruValue back in December. That’s when we first met Dave. He listened to everything we was looking for and showed us every mobile home on the lot lol. We left that day because we was waiting on our house to sell and told him we would be back once that got done. We went back in March and we asked for Dave again. That day we looked at mobile homes again and he listened to everything we wanted. I would highly recommend Dave to anymore looking for a mobile home. Any questions we have or had he would get right back with us.  Thank you so much to Dave.

name: Trina Hedquist
text:
Let me tell you all about how they flipped my mom's life upside down. Let me take a minute, just sit right there. I'll tell you how this business made my mom pull out her hair. (figuratively)

Let's start with Wayne (who is apparently fired and so is his manager) who signed a deal with my mom assuring her they could purchase her property of choice and put the property and trailer together. My mother was approved for an FHA loan and we found the PERFECT property. They told us they got the property owner to lower the price to 20K but really and secretly Wayne had it to 15,500.... not sure if his shady ways was what got him fired but I would say it's a good bet..... anyway... Wayne "forgot" to send the money for escrow to the property owner. They were supposed to close on the property on a Thursday in the beginning of April of 2021. The DAY BEFORE CLOSING ON THE PROPERTY we find out that Wayne didn't fill out any information for the corporate office to take care of closing info and he just "forgot" all about the closing at all. So then the seller of the property raised his fee (understandably) back to original cost and made big demands for the runaround.

Then we find out that Wayne is fired later and that his manager is too. Now we are told that they are going to put my mom with another guy named Austin (not the manager Austin) who allegedly is the FHA guy on the site. Well my mom already had a lender and was approved. This company INSISTS they will not buy the property unless she uses THEIR lender. And not to worry they do FHA. HA! Here's the rub this place is running the show like a used cars salesman and trying to wrangle deals that can't work for my mom. Her FHA was for 3.5% down...now they want 10% even though she is in the right score for the 3.5%. They tried to say she doesn't qualify or for the right amount her lender said she did. But my mom and brother were doing it together. In the meantime, they are REFUSING to buy this property they originally assured her they could buy with HER LENDER....suddenly that is no longer something they can do.

They want to force my mom off the FHA loan because they don't make as much and they can't add "points" to make money off of. I am not fooled. I worked in the housing industry. Most people buying modular and mobile are lower incomes and this company is using used car, predatory lending practices and it's gross. My mom had been looking for a house since FEBRUARY. It was going to be her very first home ever buying. She was so excited and this entire process has soured everything and she still doesn't have her home or her property and now has to just keep looking for a home because we refuse to let her do business with this shady company who was just looking to prey on my mom's limited knowledge on mortgages to their advantage. Do not go here. If you are lower income, this isn't the place for you. They have zero integrity and no transparency. Run as fast as you can the other way.

resp.text: Hi Trina, thanks for sharing your experience with us. Customer service is of the upmost importance to us and we take feedback very seriously. Can you please give us a call at 1-877-264-2812 so we can document your concerns? We'd like to loop in the appropriate parties here at the home office for support.

name: Angela Reynolds
text:
I purchased my home October 9, 2019, I have been going back and forth with Tru Value Homes (Tony and Austin). Tony was wonderful at the beginning of my home purchase. So many broken promises on my move in date. On October 24, 2019 the first part of my home was delivered, and the second part was delivered a week later. The other part was set up on November 2, 2019. To this day I am not in my home. Several promises were made about when I was going to be in my home. The first date was Thanksgiving that was a fail, then it was a promise to move in by Christmas. So, Thanksgiving and Christmas has come and gone! With that being said, I am still not in my home and very dissatisfied with my home.
There are numerous defects and flaws in my home. I feel that you have let me down as a company. With me moving in that means that I am NOT satisfied with the work that is done at the home.
I have exalted other means to communicate the importance of getting my home completed.

ATTACHED ARE SOME PICTURES OF MY HOME

resp.text: Angela, I appreciate your feedback! I see that you've been in touch with the Home Buidling Facility and that there's a plan in place. If you need anything else, please don't hesitate to reach out!

name: hannah Bonds
text: We had the best experience at true value. Dave was awesome! He helped us find a home and helped us close fast . He made our experience stress free and easy. I Definitely recommend him and true value. The staff is very helpful and friendly. Be sure to ask for Dave!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words, Hannah!

name: April Shank
text: My husband and I were looking for a manufactured home. We went to 3 different home centers. We finally ended up at Tru value homes. Dave Chesterman was great to deal with. He took a lot of time showing us the model homes. He had a lot of great suggestions on which homes to look at, based on the features we were looking for. The service we have received from Dave is second to none. We had never been through a construction loan process. He always tries to make sure all our questions are answered in a timely manner.

resp.text: Hi April, thank you for choosing TruValue Homes! We're so happy that you had a wonderful homebuying experience!

name: mike bemis
text: All I have to say is, “Dave!”  That guy was was awesome! He was so fast and easy to deal with. Highly recommend this business as well as the rep. Ask for Dave.

name: Steven Kay
text: I've been part of the TruValue & Clayton Home team for over a year & I've never worked for a Company that bent over backwards for their customers like the team @ TruValue. They truly care.

name: Shawn Kelsey
text: It was easy and simple experience they treated me like I was a king and showed me the true value way. I enjoyed meeting everyone and with the warranty they offer everything is taken care of while I settled in to my new home.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Shawn! We really appreciate the kind words and feedback!

name: Allison Crosson
text: TruValue Homes has a great group of people to work with. They do care about their customers and put hard work in from each department of the business.

resp.text: Hi Allison, thank you for reaching out and sharing your experience with us. We truly appreciate your feedback and we're so happy you chose TruValue Homes!

name: Charlie Christopher
text: Austin Lesley is a truly professional and knowledgeable GM, even though he has a lot on his shoulders everything we have asked of him he has made sure we were satisfied. I would recommend this place to everyone. All the people who works there is super nice and professional!

resp.text: Thank you, Charlie. Your feedback means the world! 😀

name: Joseph McConnon
text: All the salesmen were very knowledgeable on there product Patrick McConnon was extremely helpful a great listener we will be buying a home from him soon

resp.text: Thank you, Kim! We look forward to working with you!

name: billie sue
text: My experience at TruValue homes has been very pleasant and i would fully recommend buying a home from here. Austin and staff are very knowledgeable and professional. Thank you all for a great experience!

resp.text: Thank you, Billie Sue. We value your feedback and hope you have a wonderful day!

name: Dave Chesterman
text: Great customer service and was treated great and with care.

resp.text: We're so happy to hear that, David! We hope you have a great day!

name: Ricky Lester
text: These guys don't even deserve a star period especially if your a cash buyer . It has been a nightmare from hell . I advise anyone that's in the market for a mobile home to keep on looking elsewhere . The quality , Craftsmanship and most of all honesty doesn't exist at all ! But you can get a better price here , but trust me in all aspects ....it will cost you a whole lot more in the long run. If your a out of state purchaser,  stay away from here please because when you've had enough of they're BS and your ready to hire an attorney,  you'll have to do so in the state of Al ! Luckily I found one that's very aware of they're way of conducting business and was more than happy to take on the case . I'll be posing the outcome of this issue as this matter is handled in court . And please , keep all your paperwork,  documentations as I luckily did and even if you have to wear a recording device  I strongly recommend it because you'll need it .

resp.text:
Hi Ricky-
Thank you for your feedback. I would like to get more information about your visit to our location, Tru Value Homes. Please give me a call at 256-820-0510 at your earliest convenience. Thank you and I hope to hear from you soon! -Austin Lesley, G.M. Tru Value Homes

name: Jimmy Cotton
text: Stay away from this place! Everybody that work there are biggest lier in Calhoun also! They you a lie to your face! NOTHING BUT LIER!!!! You save money anywhere else. And other places tell you the truth.

resp.text: Hi Jimmy, we appreciate your feedback. Unfortuantely, we do not show a record of sale or a visit from you to TruValue Homes of Alexandria. Please contact us at 256-820-0510 if you need more information. Thank you.

name: Jamie chastain
text: I stopped by TruValue to look at some home and surprisingly I was not bombarded by salesmen when I got out of my car. I filled out an application and the manager, Austin made sure i was comfortable while doing so. David helped me with any questions I had. Wayne went over the process with me and made sure i understood. Great place. I highly recommend them!

name: Corey Moore
text: This team really helps people. Great homes.

name: Alicia Glass
text: So far everything is going as planned. David has been straight up and went beyond what he had to. We picked color out and carpet. I will update when it gets on my property and everything is done. As of now very pleased with Tru value and David.

name: TheLandMammal Foodiez
text: Great deals w/ knowledgeable staff that let's you look around w/out hassling you, they patiently walk you through the purchasing process & seem to go above & beyond. I will update in the coming months on the warranty end.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words and recommendation! We are so excited for you and hope you love your new home!

name: J D P
text: They was not as nice as other ones I looked at. The one that was kind of nice looked like it was in a tornado

name: Gloom Ag
text: We just purchase our home ....the process was horrible we were given false info...they told us things like we wont have a payment till feb ...they never installed our steps we had to get temorary steps made to move in ....even after they finished the underpin (which Took them forever to come and do ) they never installed our steps we still do not have back steps ..the inside of my home was put together Poorly ...it was just a mess everything from the beginning to the end ...i told my husband about the reviews before we closed but he felt we were in to deep and stuck ...but this was just the worse dec ever  ...do not use them

resp.text: Hello, we appreciate your feedback, and we are sorry to hear about your experience. We would like to learn more about this. Please contact us directly at 256-820-0510 so that we may assist, you. Thank you!

name: B B
text: They trashed a sweet old lady’s yard and lie about fixing things. Austin lies and lies offering nothing but excuses. Shameful to treat the elderly this way.

resp.text:
Hi TS,
We want to sincerely apologize for your negative experience at our location. We would like to learn more about your visit and what exactly happened. Please give us a call at 256-820-0510 so we can try to make things right. We look forward to hearing from you and earning back your business. -The Team at TruValue Homes of Alexandria

name: Rose Saxon
text: Not very helpful in getting a home. They say they help people with bad or no credit. Told me my credit wasnt good enough, and they are repo trailors

resp.text:
Hi Rose-
Thank you for your feedback. As discussed in our previous conversations, our team has done everything possible to help resolve these issues. Unfortunately, some factors, including financing, are beyond our control. Our hope is to help as many families as possible achieve their homeownership dreams and we are so sorry things did not work out this time. Please feel free to reach out to me if there is anything I can do to amend your experience. -Austin Lesley, G.M. Tru Value Alexandria

name: Tammy Baxter
text: This place is an absolute JOKE. My mother recently purchased a new home from them and the entire experience was a total NIGHTMARE. We are now in the stage where her yard is nothing but uneven dirt, random metal, nails, ??? are all over the place. The manager Austin will tell you whatever you need to hear to not have to deal with you and should be absolutely ashamed of himself for running a "business" the way that he does. We wish we would have seen their google rating before we started down this road, as we are certainly not the only dissatisfied customers. JUST LOOK ELSEWHERE.

resp.text:
Hi Tammy,
I appreciate your review. Your feedback is extremely valuable to us, as we strive to improve with each and every day. I would like to talk to you more about it, so please give me a call at 256-820-0510 so we can review the problem. Thank you! -Austin Lesley, G.M.

name: Tina Pierce
text: I bought a single wide mobile home from them and they are the best place to get a mobile home and they are fast and nice very friendly and helpful will help you out anyway possible this place is the best place to get a mobile home at !

name: Brandy Farley
text: We are buying a repo. We've had it since May and still haven't received the skirting and have found mold 2 months ago and our fireplace pours everytime it rains. The one that did our sale and the GM won't even respond about the mold and keep putting us off on the skirting, which was included in the price, was supposed to send someone about the fireplace and, of course, never did. Thank God for the mortgage company because they are going to have our stuff fixed where TruValue should have stepped up! The guys at Truvalue, overall are good people but they don't do what they should or say they will.

resp.text:
Hi Brandy,
Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. I am so sorry to hear your experience with us was less than satisfactory. I would like to take the time to talk with you to learn more. Please call me at 256-820-0510 at your earliest convenience. Thank you! -Austin Lesley, G.M.

name: Clint Murphy
text: By far the lowest prices and best service in Alabama and Georgia for new and used Manufactured homes.

name: Tony Stone
text: Knowledgeable sales staff with the best prices in town!!

name: L Poole
text: Worst Home buying experience I have ever had.I have purchased 3 New manufactured homes in the last 6 yrs.I can honestly say this has been the worst transaction and service I have seen or been a part of.Promise's made,did not meet those.Follow up service has been a total nightmare. Lost a lot of work and took off alot expecting follow up work to get done or completed. Didn't happen.They just tell you what you need to hear to pacify you.But the work just gets put off. Total nightmare.Time to go to Corporate.

resp.text:
L Poole,
Thank you for your feedback. I am sorry to hear you had a poor experience. I would like to get more information about this, so please call me at 256-820-0510 so we can discuss further. Thank you! – Austin Lesley, G.M. TRU Homes of Alexandria

name: Candi Crosson
text: Very knowledgeable sales staff & very helpful.

name: Stan Nelson
text: The movers they have are going to get ppl killed then cussed me like. A yard foh.I reported it and just hot blown off

resp.text:
Stan,

Thank you for your feedback. Unfortunately, we do not have record of your information at our location, TRU Homes of Alexandria.  I would like to get more information about this, so please call me at 256-820-0510  so we can discuss further. Thank you! – Austin Lesley, G.M. TRU Homes of Alexandria

name: Richard Barber
text: Great team, laid back, no pressure!!

name: Karen Pettus
text: NEVER EVER AGAIN! Save yourself the headache and the money and go somewhere else... far far away from TruValue Homes of Alexandria!

resp.text:
Karen,

Thank you for your feedback. I am sorry to hear you had a poor experience. I am glad I was able to get in contact with you today. Please call me at 256-820-0510 if you have any further questions. Thank you! – Austin Lesley, G.M. TRU Homes of Alexandria

name: Steven Mann
text: These people work for you

name: Steve Buchanan
text: Good people

name: Starr Sepeda
text: I’ve never actually bought from here but after seeing one star in just about all the reviews I probably never will!

resp.text: I appreciate your review. Your feedback is extremely valuable to us, as we strive to improve with each and every day. I would like to talk to you more about it, so please give me a call at 256-820-0510 so we can review the problem. Thank you! -Austin Lesley, G.M. TRU Value Homes

name: Starr Sepeda
text: I’ve never actually bought from here but after seeing one star in just about all the reviews I probably never will!

resp.text: I appreciate your review. Your feedback is extremely valuable to us, as we strive to improve with each and every day. I would like to talk to you more about it, so please give me a call at 256-820-0510 so we can review the problem. Thank you! -Austin Lesley, G.M. TRU Value Homes

name: Susan Abernathy
text: I would have put negative 100 if i could have!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

resp.text:
Hi Susan-
We apologize that our location did not satisfy your expectations. We set a high standard for ourselves as far as customer service and are truly sorry to hear that standard was not met in your interaction with our location. I would love to discuss your experience at your earliest convenience. Please reach out to me personally at 256-820-0510. Thank you! -Austin Lesley, G.M. Tru Value Homes

name: Anessa Hammel
text: Found our first home to buy! I thought it would be harder to find what we were looking for but it wasn't! They have a decent selection of mobile homes, single and double wide. What I like about Clayton Homes is that you walk in and could never even tell that you're in a mobile home. They have everything from 3 to 5 bedrooms with spacious rooms and huge master baths inside. The customer service was on point and if you decide to go, I definitely recommend asking for Kyle. He is very knowledgeable and gives you a chance to look around without hassling you. So far, so good and even though we haven't bought our home yet, I definitely recommend Clayton Homes in Pelham.

name: Michelle Reynolds
text: My Dad and Sister had a great experience with Kyle he was patient with us in making our decision. We came back the second time to do the paperwork. I along with my family would recommend Clayton Homes to friends and family. Kyle is fantastic🤗

name: Nikaveli ThaWhitePantha
text: Very nice selection of mobile homes and modular homes

name: Joshua Hobbs
text: Kyle is great!  I can be a pest about things but the people at Clayton have been pretty patient with me.  Only issues I've had are weather related delays but they have dealt with those and gotten a lot done in a little amount of time.

name: Katie
text: Super friendly and helpful! I will definitely be returning soon. :)

name: michael crowley
text: Very cheaply built. Trying to get a repair tech out is like pulling teeth. I will never buy a Clayton home again. JUNK

resp.text: Hello Michael, we appreciate you reaching out! Our customer advocacy team is looking into these issues for you to see how we can help. We appreciate your patience!

name: Bridget Yazel
text: We were told over the phone that we could come in to discuss building a modular home with multiple options.  After traveling to meet with them we were advised that their “modular homes” are simply trailers on foundations.

resp.text:
Hi Bridget-
I appreciate your review. Your feedback is extremely valuable to us, as we strive to improve with each and every day. I would like to talk to you more about it, so please give me a call at 205-663-3730 so we can review the problem. Thank you! -David Couch, Clayton Homes of Pelham

name: Dana Taff
text: If you buy one of these homes, expect it to immediately become a liability! During delivery process, walls fell down, I had water damage, all the molding was hanging loose. All the exterior siding has deep waves. I got the state involved in my attempt to have these things addressed. They came out and made an assessment, but when that was done, they basically said they couldn’t force them to fix anything. Pay careful attention to detail. Door plates, plastic toilet seats, raise the windows, molding, unfinished interiors of closets, just to mention a few. Better yet, if you have a choice, never but a mobile home from this place!!

name: Kim Statham
text: I love that they have several set up homes for you to view.

name: Jason Johnson
text: Bought a home... When it was delivered, no lights in the bedrooms, Manager sent employee out to give us lamps 🤦🏻‍♂️

name: Carie Armstrong
text: Worst company I ever dealt with

resp.text:
Carie,
We apologize that our location did not satisfy your expectations. We set a high standard for ourselves as far as customer service and are truly sorry to hear that standard was not met in your interaction with our location. I would love to discuss your experience at your earliest convenience. Please reach out to me personally at 205-663-3730 . Thank you! -David Couch, G.M. Clayton Homes of Pelham

name: beardenjim
text: Great people here.

name: rina witherspoon
text: Beautiful homes

name: Keyandrea Varner
text: Nice customer service.

name: Destiny Fitch
text: Great prople
